Question:

The granddaughter wanted to sit closer to the front because of having recently started experiencing some loss of hearing, and the 72 year old agreed just to be supportive. Who did not have any trouble hearing? Answer with one of the following options: ('The 72 year old', 'Undetermined', 'The granddaughter')

Answer:
